projects.title: Developing e-course in collaboration with UMC Utrecht International office
projects.description: In a team with my fellow 'young innovators' we contributed to the development of an e-course that medical students from four different Universities (Utrecht, Karolinska Institute, Nijmegen, Leiden) will take prior to going abroad for a medical internship. The part that we worked on was Access to Medicine. For this part, we developed case-based questions and flowcharts, illustrating the development of drugs from research to patient use.

profile_positions.description: cardiac surgery and thoracic oncological surgery, including robotic lung surgery.
profile_positions.title: Cardio-thoracic surgical resident physician

profile_positions.description: Together with the department of cardio-thoracic surgery (Erasmus MC) and in collaboration with industrial partners; MedicalVR, Thirona, Fysicon EVOCS we have developed an innovative preoperative surgical planning platform for complex and personalized lung surgery. PulmoVR is a virtual reality and artifical intelligence based tool that provides thoracic surgeons 3D and realistic views of their patients’ specific anatomy.
profile_positions.title: Co-inventor PulmoVR and CardioVR (virtual reality surgical planning tool for lung and heart surgery)

profile_positions.description:
Ph.D. researcher on heart failure and cardiac remodeling in congenital and adult heart disease. 

Topics of interest:
- Cardiac adverse remodeling
- Bioengineering
- Organ-on-a-chips
- Right and left sided heart failure
- heart failure in congenital heart disease
profile_positions.title: Ph.D. Candidate at the Department of Cardio-thoracic surgery

profile_positions.description: Clinical rotation at the adult intensive care unit, the thorax intensive care and cardiology unit as part of my clinical traineeship in cardio-thoracic surgery.
profile_positions.title: Intensive care, cardiolgy, and pulmonology rotation

profile_positions.description: Medical doctor at the cardiothoracic surgery department.
profile_positions.title: ANIOS Cardio-thoracic surgery

profile_positions.description:
co-founder & advisory board member of a new organization that focuses on organizing Health Hackathons together with MIT (Massachusetts Institute of Technology) Hacking Medicine. 
More info and how to apply: www.avicennahackathon.nl
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder Avicenna Hackathon

profile_positions.description:
Together with a master's student in Pharmacy (Milad Tannazi), I co-founded Avicenna Excellence Program with the goal of strengthening the bonds between students, (industrial) professionals from different faculties and disciplines. We think that interdisciplinary collaboration could potentially lead to better solutions and innovations in todays healthcare system. Therefore, we have designed an interdisciplinary healthcare and innovation focused program for master students in the Netherlands. 

Avicenna excellence program is focused on the interdisciplinary collaboration between master students in Medicine, Pharmacy, Innovation Sciences, Graduate school of life sciences, Economics and Law and professionals in (healthcare related) companies, NGO's and government institutes. In last year's program, students have been working on real-life health-care solutions and innovations with one of the biggest pharmaceutical companies in the world: Merck (Merck Sharp & Dohme) Pharmaceuticals. This year we had executives such as Wouter Bos (CEO VUmc), Hans de Jong (CEO Philips), Frank Mattijsen (CFO MSD), Wim Leereveld (CEO Access to medicine index) as invited speakers. 

More information about the program and how to sign up can be found on the website: www.avicennaxp.nl or facebook (avicenna excellence program)
profile_positions.title: Co-founder &  Board Member

profile_positions.description: interdisciplinary course for master’s students in Medicine (SUMMA), Biomedical sciences and Engineering (TU Eindhoven) aimed at stimulating interdisciplinarity in order to come up with innovative solutions for medical problems.
profile_positions.title: External Tutor/teacher interdisciplinary education

profile_positions.description: Apollo is an international collaborative project between the EUREKA institute and its partner universities (Toronto, Singapore) with the aim of supporting students to develop the knowledge, skills, and experience that will support a career in the field of translational medicine.
profile_positions.title: Student member - Apollo Translational Medicine Honors Program

profile_positions.description: Monitoring the quality of the curriculum of SUMMA (Selective Utrecht Medical Master) is a task of the training coordinator SUMMA with the program director medicine. The program director and training coordinator perform this task together with the Education Board consisting of two student members and all the programme coordinators.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Educational Board of SUMMA

profile_positions.description:
Main task of the year representatives is evaluation of the courses and subjects during the academic years. 
functions: writing course reports (with comments, suggestions, complaints, compliments) for the education boards and programme/course coordinators, participating in educational committees with other year representatives and education board members of SUMMA, meetings with the programme directors and line coordinators etc.
profile_positions.title: Year Representative

profile_positions.description: SUM(MONTH) is a Monthly newsletter for all the SUMMA medical students and staff at Utrecht University. I initiated this newsletter in January 2015, together with two fellow students in collaboration with the Educational Board of SUMMA. Every month we publish several columns on medical and non-medical topics and we have multiple guest-writers and interviews.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Main Editor (SUMMAAND)
